channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (13 Nov 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Jamaluddin Rahmat
item.dc:creator: Jamaluddin Rahmat
item.description:
Wow...
I think it's a bug because pro member can download the third party themes. I guess I wrong after read this post.
item.content:encoded:
Wow…

I think it’s a bug because pro member can download the third party themes.
I guess I wrong after read this post.

item.title: By: Carly

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-13/#comment-235">Frank Schrijvers</a>.
You're welcome, Frank. Looking forward to it!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Frank Schrijvers.

You’re welcome, Frank. Looking forward to it!

item.title: By: Frank Schrijvers
item.dc:creator: Frank Schrijvers
item.description:
Hi Nick,
Thanks for the lovely compliments. I hope the forest theme meets the expectations. Plan to release it this month.
Best,
Frank
item.content:encoded:
Hi Nick,

Thanks for the lovely compliments. I hope the forest theme meets the expectations. Plan to release it this month.

Best,

Frank

item.title: By: Carly
item.dc:creator: Carly
item.description: Oh my - what a wonderful surprise! I came here to see what's new and I see Lindsey from PDCD tweet out the redesign I did for my client - Old English Doors AND you included it here. THANK YOU SO MUCH - this has made my day!
item.content:encoded: Oh my – what a wonderful surprise! I came here to see what’s new and I see Lindsey from PDCD tweet out the redesign I did for my client – Old English Doors AND you included it here. THANK YOU SO MUCH – this has made my day!
